input.sentences: my wife was dressed in a very lovely white dress .
we all gathered together for that occasion .
i had a lot of family members who showed me support .
my mom and dad were together as well .
the bride and the uncle were taking pictures beforehand .
output.sentences: I have waited so long to wear this dress and the moment is here.
Everyone I loved was with me in these special moments
So glad we could get so much support from our friends and family.
Mom and dad were so kind to take some special time with us before we started off our big day.
Special thanks to my uncle for taking this picture of this special moment that every little girl dreams of her whole life.
